did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: The first volume contains the minutes of the First Religious Society of Homer. The second volume contains records of the Church of Christ in Homer. The third volume contains records of the Homer Congregational Church. The fourth volume contains minutes of the Homer Congregational Church.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: The first volume contains the minutes of the First Religious Society of Homer (1799-1856). The second volume contains records of the Church of Christ in Homer and includes membership lists, confession of faith, covenant, forms and practice, baptismal records, financial records, death records and lists of excommunicated persons (1801-1834). The third volume contains records of the Homer Congregational Church, including membership lists, lists of deacons, financial records, church statistics (1840-1855) and resolutions and acts of the church (1840-1855). The fourth volume contains minutes of the Homer Congregational Church (1856-1910).
